about_the_game:
Try to escape from the mansion where William H. was kidnapped due to a case!
Enter the rooms, examine the cabinets in detail, collect pieces of paper, try to open the safes and solve various puzzles. Help William H. get out of the house!
Be a part of the little game we designed and tried to make!

Erased Case is a new puzzle mystery game developed by the creators of Lightfall Team.


At the mansion where William H was kidnapped
Enjoy an immersive adventure full of mysteries and of course puzzles.

You will go in and out of many rooms
You will collect clues by going through many different rooms. You will interact with different items in the rooms. Sometimes you will enter the password of a safe and sometimes you will try to open a stuck door.

What should you do
After collecting all the clues and solving all the puzzles, you will try to escape from this house! Also, don't forget to try to solve the story about William H!

You can take the first step by adding the game to your wish list!

short_description: In this pixel puzzle-escape game you are a detective who has been kidnapped for a case. Wander through the rooms, check the cabinets, collect the pieces of paper and try to escape from this mysterious mansion where William H was kidnapped!
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, German, Spanish - Latin America
